summary: This spell to conjure a warm bed.
descriptionHtml:
Hail summoner! Conjure me up a warm bed, would you? Now you can! Conjure a Warm Bed with this spell. Purchase the tome or scroll from Phinis Gestor at the College of Winterhold.

This spell features:
[list][*][size=2]The bed conjured is random. Conjure a cheap bed, a fancy bed, a orcish bed, or a dwarven bed. Whatever.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Dual cast for a random double bed.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Bed unsummons after a brief period of time, or until you or your follower stop using it.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Only one bed can be summoned at a time, no building stairs with beds to reach impossible locations[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]The bed is aligned to the player and the ground. No slanted beds.[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
Requirements:
[list][*][size=2]SKSE[/size][/*]
[/list]
Compatibility:
[list][*][size=2]Alters Phinis Gestor's merchant chest, but does not alter any leveled lists.[/size][/*]
[/list]
Installation:
[list][*][size=2]Install with whatever mod organizer you have. Or extract the files into your skyrim directory.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Make sure the spell is dispelled, then uninstall with your mod organizer, or delete "data/Conjure Warm Bed.esp" and "data/scripts/SummonBedScript.pex" from your skyrim directory.[/size][/*]
[/list]
Known Issues:
[list][*][size=2]Any assortment of issues can come up if you try to cast the spell in strange locations: really close to a wall, inside a tight corridor, while water-walking... Luckily the bed unsummons itself, so you shouldn't break anything permanently.[/size][/*]
[/list][/size]
author: WankingSkeever
